channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘This seems absolutely insane’: Our children pay rent on our investment properties. Our lawyer says they should still buy us out.
item.description: “They have already paid the mortgage. It makes no sense to require them to ‘pay’ it again.”

item.title: ‘Where are we vulnerable?’ My husband and I are in our 50s. Our $450K mortgage is paid off. We have $500K in IRAs.
item.description: “We will not be downsizing our home, but we do have rental income of about $1,500 per month.”

item.title: ‘This feels like an opportunity’: I’m 55, earn $78,000 and have no kids. My mother gave me $10,000. What should I do?
item.description: “I also have $1,000 on a credit card, which will be paid in full next month.”

item.title: Letters of Intent in Mergers and Acquisitions
item.description: In acquisitions of privately held companies, an acquisition letter of intent/term sheet is often entered into by both parties. The purpose of the lett...

item.title: My Taiwanese immigrant friend started working in Walmart for minimum wage and retired with $2 million. What was her secret?
item.description: “She owns two houses and lives with a disabled son.”

item.title: ‘The stress at my job is getting worse every day’: I’m 61, earn $177K, and have a 401(k) with $965K. Do I retire and downsize?
item.description: “I don’t want to end up in a nursing home on Medicare like my grandma.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
